49 namespace detail {
50 
52 
59 template <typename Perm, typename Arg, typename Result>
60 inline void permute_array(const Perm& perm, const Arg& arg, Result& result) {
61  TA_ASSERT(size(result) == size(arg));
62  const unsigned int n = size(arg);
63  for (unsigned int i = 0u; i < n; ++i) {
64  const typename Perm::index_type pi = perm[i];
65  TA_ASSERT(i < size(arg));
66  TA_ASSERT(pi < size(result));
67  result[pi] = arg[i];
68  }
69 }
70 } // namespace detail
71 
77 
123 class Permutation {
124  public:
125  typedef Permutation Permutation_;
126  typedef unsigned int index_type;
127  typedef std::vector<index_type>::const_iterator const_iterator;
128 
129  private:
131  std::vector<index_type> p_;
132 
136  template <typename InIter>
137  bool valid_permutation(InIter first, InIter last) {
138  bool result = true;
139  using diff_type = typename std::iterator_traits<InIter>::difference_type;
140  const diff_type n = std::distance(first, last);
141  TA_ASSERT(n >= 0);
142  for (; first != last; ++first) {
143  const diff_type value = *first;
144  result = result && value >= 0 && (value < n) &&
145  (std::count(first, last, *first) == 1ul);
146  }
147  return result;
148  }
149 
150  // Used to select the correct constructor based on input template types
151  struct Enabler {};
152 
153  public:
154  Permutation() = default; // constructs an invalid Permutation
155  Permutation(const Permutation&) = default;
156  Permutation(Permutation&&) = default;
157  ~Permutation() = default;
158  Permutation& operator=(const Permutation&) = default;
159  Permutation& operator=(Permutation&& other) = default;
160 
162 
169  template <typename InIter, typename std::enable_if<detail::is_input_iterator<
170  InIter>::value>::type* = nullptr>
171  Permutation(InIter first, InIter last) : p_(first, last) {
172  TA_ASSERT(valid_permutation(first, last));
173  }
174 
176 
179  template <typename Integer>
180  explicit Permutation(const std::vector<Integer>& a)
181  : Permutation(a.begin(), a.end()) {}
182 
184 
187  explicit Permutation(std::vector<index_type>&& a) : p_(std::move(a)) {
188  TA_ASSERT(valid_permutation(p_.begin(), p_.end()));
189  }
190 
192 
195  template <typename Integer,
196  typename std::enable_if<std::is_integral<Integer>::value>::type* =
197  nullptr>
198  explicit Permutation(std::initializer_list<Integer> list)
199  : Permutation(list.begin(), list.end()) {}
200 
202 
204  index_type dim() const { return p_.size(); }
205 
207 
209  const_iterator begin() const { return p_.begin(); }
210 
212 
214  const_iterator cbegin() const { return p_.cbegin(); }
215 
217 
219  const_iterator end() const { return p_.end(); }
220 
222 
224  const_iterator cend() const { return p_.cend(); }
225 
227 
230  index_type operator[](unsigned int i) const { return p_[i]; }
231 
233 
247  std::vector<std::vector<index_type>> cycles() const {
248  std::vector<std::vector<index_type>> result;
249 
250  std::vector<bool> placed_in_cycle(p_.size(), false);
251 
252  // 1. for each i compute its orbit
253  // 2. if the orbit is longer than 1, sort and add to the list of cycles
254  for (index_type i = 0; i != p_.size(); ++i) {
255  if (not placed_in_cycle[i]) {
256  std::vector<index_type> cycle(1, i);
257  placed_in_cycle[i] = true;
258 
259  index_type next_i = p_[i];
260  while (next_i != i) {
261  cycle.push_back(next_i);
262  placed_in_cycle[next_i] = true;
263  next_i = p_[next_i];
264  }
265 
266  if (cycle.size() != 1) {
267  std::sort(cycle.begin(), cycle.end());
268  result.emplace_back(cycle);
269  }
270 
271  } // this i already in a cycle
272  } // loop over i
273 
274  return result;
275  }
276 
278 
281  static Permutation identity(const unsigned int dim) {
282  Permutation result;
283  result.p_.reserve(dim);
284  for (unsigned int i = 0u; i < dim; ++i) result.p_.emplace_back(i);
285  return result;
286  }
287 
289 
291  Permutation identity() const { return identity(p_.size()); }
292 
294 
297  Permutation mult(const Permutation& other) const {
298  const unsigned int n = p_.size();
299  TA_ASSERT(n == other.p_.size());
300  Permutation result;
301  result.p_.reserve(n);
302 
303  for (unsigned int i = 0u; i < n; ++i) {
304  const index_type p_i = p_[i];
305  const index_type result_i = other.p_[p_i];
306  result.p_.emplace_back(result_i);
307  }
308 
309  return result;
310  }
311 
313 
317  Permutation inv() const {
318  const index_type n = p_.size();
319  Permutation result;
320  result.p_.resize(n, 0ul);
321  for (index_type i = 0ul; i < n; ++i) {
322  const index_type pi = p_[i];
323  result.p_[pi] = i;
324  }
325  return result;
326  }
327 
329 
334  Permutation pow(int n) const {
335  // Initialize the algorithm inputs
336  int power;
337  Permutation value;
338  if (n < 0) {
339  value = inv();
340  power = -n;
341  } else {
342  value = *this;
343  power = n;
344  }
345 
346  Permutation result = identity(p_.size());
347 
348  // Compute the power of value with the exponentiation by squaring.
349  while (power) {
350  if (power & 1) result = result.mult(value);
351  value = value.mult(value);
352  power >>= 1;
353  }
354 
355  return result;
356  }
357 
359 
361  operator bool() const { return !p_.empty(); }
362 
364 
366  bool operator!() const { return p_.empty(); }
367 
369 
371  const std::vector<index_type>& data() const { return p_; }
372 
374 
378  template <typename Archive>
379  void serialize(Archive& ar) {
380  ar& p_;
381  }
382 
383 }; // class Permutation

386 
391 inline bool operator==(const Permutation& p1, const Permutation& p2) {
392  return (p1.dim() == p2.dim()) &&
393  std::equal(p1.data().begin(), p1.data().end(), p2.data().begin());
394 }
395 
397 
402 inline bool operator!=(const Permutation& p1, const Permutation& p2) {
403  return !operator==(p1, p2);
404 }
405 
407 
412 inline bool operator<(const Permutation& p1, const Permutation& p2) {
413  return std::lexicographical_compare(p1.data().begin(), p1.data().end(),
414  p2.data().begin(), p2.data().end());
415 }
416 
418 
422 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& output, const Permutation& p) {
423  std::size_t n = p.dim();
424  output << "{";
425  for (unsigned int dim = 0; dim < n - 1; ++dim)
426  output << dim << "->" << p.data()[dim] << ", ";
427  output << n - 1 << "->" << p.data()[n - 1] << "}";
428  return output;
429 }

435 inline Permutation operator-(const Permutation& perm) { return perm.inv(); }
436 
438 
443 inline Permutation operator*(const Permutation& p1, const Permutation& p2) {
444  return p1.mult(p2);
445 }
446 
448 inline Permutation& operator*=(Permutation& p1, const Permutation& p2) {
449  return (p1 = p1 * p2);
450 }
451 
453 
459 inline Permutation operator^(const Permutation& perm, int n) {
460  return perm.pow(n);
461 }

465 
474 template <typename T, std::size_t N>
475 inline std::array<T, N> operator*(const Permutation& perm,
476  const std::array<T, N>& a) {
477  TA_ASSERT(perm.dim() == a.size());
478  std::array<T, N> result;
479  detail::permute_array(perm, a, result);
480  return result;
481 }
482 
484 
492 template <typename T, std::size_t N>
493 inline std::array<T, N>& operator*=(std::array<T, N>& a,
494  const Permutation& perm) {
495  TA_ASSERT(perm.dim() == a.size());
496  const std::array<T, N> temp = a;
497  detail::permute_array(perm, temp, a);
498  return a;
499 }
500 
502 
510 template <typename T, typename A>
511 inline std::vector<T> operator*(const Permutation& perm,
512  const std::vector<T, A>& v) {
513  TA_ASSERT(perm.dim() == v.size());
514  std::vector<T> result(perm.dim());
515  detail::permute_array(perm, v, result);
516  return result;
517 }
518 
520 
528 template <typename T, typename A>
529 inline std::vector<T, A>& operator*=(std::vector<T, A>& v,
530  const Permutation& perm) {
531  const std::vector<T, A> temp = v;
532  detail::permute_array(perm, temp, v);
533  return v;
534 }
535 
537 
542 template <typename T>
543 inline std::vector<T> operator*(const Permutation& perm,
544  const T* MADNESS_RESTRICT const ptr) {
545  const unsigned int n = perm.dim();
546  std::vector<T> result(n);
547  for (unsigned int i = 0u; i < n; ++i) {
548  const typename Permutation::index_type perm_i = perm[i];
549  const T ptr_i = ptr[i];
550  result[perm_i] = ptr_i;
551  }
552  return result;
553 }
